page.title: 09Ardross: amenities
page.content: (2)Church (cont.) the/ Church of Scotland and the Free Church at Rosskeen West. There are two ministers and 6 to 7 families attend the services. There is a small Sunday School room but no Bible Class or Communion (which is held at Rosskeen Church). The congregation has remained static over recent years. Every first Sunday sees a Free Church service at 3pm and every second and third Sunday there is a service for Church of Scotland members at 1pm. There is a memorial from the First World War at the back of the church.
